description:
LUXE
We now welcome inspections by appointment.

Moments to Fishermans Beach, promising the comfort of contemporary design this ‘newly constructed’ 4-bedroom house reflects a chic coastal tone and functional floor plan with 2 master suites on both levels.

Free-flowing family living spills across the ground floor as a designated lounge and dining, blending into a modern kitchen, complete with butler’s pantry, quartz bench-tops and designer tap ware.
A complementing alfresco extends out to entertaining with views across the private rear yard, where easy-care landscaping occupies the remaining allotment.

The accommodation unfolds upstairs where a secondary master bedroom complete with ensuite and huge walk-in robe will suit the fussiest of buyers, complementing 2 further bedrooms with built in robes and functional second living area.

To secure your future investment this Hampton's style home is available now and is soon to be completed.

Luxury inclusions and specifications.

• Ground floor master bedroom with ensuite and walk-in robe.
• Upstairs second master bedroom, ensuite and walk-in robe.
• Study nook and separate lounge.
• Engineered timber flooring in ‘Washed Oak’.
• Quartz-finished kitchen, butler’s pantry and designer tap ware.
• ILVE Built-In Microwave, Miele, and Asko stainless steel appliances.
• Quartz-topped bench-tops in all bathrooms.
• Designated laundry, ground floor powder room and double garage.
• Timber Silvertop Ash alfresco entertaining deck.
• Private easy-care landscaping on a 379 sqm (approx.) allotment.
• Double Glazing, Ceiling fans and Ducted Heating and Cooling.
• Moments to local schools, park land reserve and shopping centers.

**For a full list of inclusions, contact the agent.
